response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 to me, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the effort put into its creation. Considering its immense value to you, I am willing to extend this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This offer is not only a chance to acquire a remarkable product but also a potential savings of $500 compared to its original valuation. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with excellence. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7500}
